availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William A. Hickman (Nelson County, KY, physician)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Son of William Hickman and Mary M. Caldwell Hickman. Married to Burnette Barbour Hickman in Nelson County on March 12, 1844. Father of James H. Hickman and Burnette B. Hickman. Married to Susan Suite Hickman in Nelson County on June 6, 1854. Father of Aurelia Hickman. Physician in Bardstown in 1850. Physician in Bardstown in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Nelson County in 1860.
